sentence.Network_en: A 40 watt bulb would be quite sufficient and would not obtrude.
sentence.Network_cn: 40瓦的灯泡完全够亮了，并且不会晃眼。

sentence.Network_en: I'm sorry to obtrude on you at such a time.
sentence.Network_cn: 我很抱歉在这个时候打扰你.

sentence.Network_en: He didn't want to obtrude on her privacy.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... obtain 获得 obtrude 闯入 obtruse 钝,愚钝,迟钝的.
GRE单词归类_百度文库 ... lope 大步跑 obtrude 强迫, 冲出，打扰- intrude 闯入-.
以o开头的英语英文单词 ... obtention 获得 obtrude 突出，强加 obtrusive 突出的，炫耀的.

list.abs: I ' m sorry to obtrude on you at such a time ., 我很抱歉在这个时候打扰你.
it is unwise for an outsider to obtrude his opinions into a family quarrel .局外人硬把自己的想法加入一场家庭争论中是不智的。
Don ' t obtrude your ideas upon others ., 不要将你的观点强加于人.
type and applications of obtruding structural vibrating reflecting line mark ., 突出结构型振动反光标线的种类和应用.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin obtrudere, from ob- 'towards' + trudere 'to push'

entry.def: When something obtrudes or when you obtrude it, it becomes noticeable in an undesirable way.

example.ex: A 40 watt bulb would be quite sufficient and would not obtrude...
example.tran: 40瓦的灯泡完全够亮了，并且不会晃眼。

example.ex: Gertrude now clearly felt that she had obtruded her sorrow...
example.tran: 格特鲁德此时明显察觉自己的悲伤情绪已影响到他人。

means.word_mean: 2. thrust oneself in as if by force;

sentences.sentence: "The colors don't intrude on the viewer"

auth_sentence.content: His masculinity did not obtrude itself upon the conversation.
auth_sentence.res_content: His masculinity did not obtrude itself upon the conversation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His masculinity did not obtrude itself upon the conversation.

stems_affixes.word_buile: intrude闯入,侵入+er人→n.侵入者;闯入者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 挤压出, 挤压成, 突出, 伸出, 逐出
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+trud推+e→v.挤压出, 挤压成, 突出, 伸出, 逐出

means.word_mean: 强行向前；强行; 强迫
